Excellent Teaching Assistant Award

13 March 2025 - less than 1 min read time
Tags: Teaching Arduino Mobile Manipulator

I worked as a TA for the Creative Design Engineering [400.018] class 2024 fall semester. I built the reference robot (mobile manipulator and its control algorithm) for the class, designed the competition field and independently managed technical TA lectures and QnA sessions.

I was awarded for the excellent teaching assistant from the College Of Engineering, Seoul National University at March 2025.

The robot competition video is uploaded in youtube!

with by Diana Nam
